Html:
Hello all,

I am trying real hard but cannot get it to work. I have to create the following:

A multiple page PDF with on each page a sort of invoice. I have a template (xls) for the invoice.

 

Creating one PDF for one invoice is working. But I would like to create a multi-page PDF with all invoices together.
The idea behind is is that the supplier only need to start printing one document per day (with multiple invoices).

Hoe do I do this?

Thanks for any help.

Regards,
Rein Schaap
